[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Core Philosophy[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Create the most thriving economic private server without premium payment or donation to access special features.[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• 100% for fun and reliving the best moments and parts of RuneScape.[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Assemble a great community with friendly and helpful staff.[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• "Endgame for everyone" Make sure drop rates are enjoyable and rewarding for all players.[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Dedication and passion drives all the creative/re-creative processes of development.[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Currently in Beta[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• 100% combat PvP & PvM[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Completely playable with economy, skills, combat, bosses and minigames![/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Dungeoneering, RuneSpan, PuroPuro[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Glacors, Strykewyrms, Jadinko Lair, Polypore Dungeon[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Fight Caves/Kiln, Yk’Lagor the Thunderous boss raid, KBD, Nomad, Oblivion[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• GWD, Nex[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Crucible, PC, QBD, Corp, TD[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Drygore, Kalphite, Chaotic claws, Max/Comp cape[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Crucible weapons, revenants, PvP gear[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Dueling, dicing, Grand Exchange[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Custom titles, Achievements, Override shop[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Loyalty points, Squeal of Fortune, Auras[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Prestige mode/points[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Generous experience rates and drops! Will not take forever to reach endgame![/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• No donation needed to access all gear and valuables![/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Difficulty levels for easier training or better drops[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]In-Development[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Complete revamp of everything will make it as realistic as RuneScape as possible clean all bugs and glitches[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• New minigames with PvPvM[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Better balancing of economy so all players thrive[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• All items properly priced and stats correct[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• New EoC models, load higher revision cache[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• New layout, optimize function and features of server[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Redo dialogues and make it more player friendly[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Exciting quests with combat and group effort[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Implement Bounty Hunting and expand from there to a dedicated PvPvM server[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Improve all current features like Prestige Mode unlocking level 120 in all stats after Prestiging a certain amount of times[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Modify all drop tables to have more variation and higher range of drops[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Add sounds to all weapons and attacks[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Make custom boss battles long and harder[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Sheathing when out-of-combat[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Remove all player commands and implement in-game dialogues/buttons instead[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Make all skills free to begin training[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Add Prestige Bonuses[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Bounty Hunter/PvP World[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• High-risk PvP[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Player Slaying, Group Slayer[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Soul Wars[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Lootshare/coinshare[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Clans with tags[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Frost dragons[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Ice strykewyrms[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Player-owned shops/Auction house[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Currently In-Progress[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Just begun, come join and be a part of this revolution now![/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Exploring packages to brainstorm priorities, creating todo list[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Setting up website, forums, youtube, webclient, etc[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Minor fixes and changes[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Pro promo video[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman]• Banner graphics design[/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][I]So, what are you waiting for?[/I][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT] [FONT=Times New Roman][I]Come check out [COLOR=red]RuneSol[/COLOR] today![/I][/FONT] item.title: RuneSol Beta! 718/753
item.dc:creator: @Jezebel Jezebel
item.description:
@Jezebel wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Times New Roman][I][SIZE=4]Welcome to[/SIZE][/I][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][B][COLOR=red][SIZE=5]RuneSol[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]| [URL=http://“http://runesol.prophpbb.com/”][COLOR=red]Website[/COLOR][/URL] | [URL=http://“http://runesol.prophpbb.com/”][COLOR=red]Forums[/COLOR][/URL] | YouTube | Webclient | [URL=http://“http://www.mediafire.com/download/64v5g6sb84tqzvl/Play+RuneSol+Beta.rar”][COLOR=red]Client Download[/COLOR][/URL] |[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][B][COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Owner[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]Win[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Why join now?[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Join during the beta and get an exclusive title, ‘Sol’![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Be the first to play and get ahead of the others! Be the first to max prestige![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Have a higher chance of being picked for a vacant staff position![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Core values, current features & development plans/concepts below![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Core Philosophy[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Create the most thriving economic private server without premium payment or donation to access special features.[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• 100% for fun and reliving the best moments and parts of RuneScape.[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Assemble a great community with friendly and helpful staff.[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• “Endgame for everyone” Make sure drop rates are enjoyable and rewarding for all players.[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Dedication and passion drives all the creative/re-creative processes of development.[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Currently in Beta[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• 100% combat PvP & PvM[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Completely playable with economy, skills, combat, bosses and minigames![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Dungeoneering, RuneSpan, PuroPuro[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Glacors, Strykewyrms, Jadinko Lair, Polypore Dungeon[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Fight Caves/Kiln, Yk’Lagor the Thunderous boss raid, KBD, Nomad, Oblivion[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• GWD, Nex[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Crucible, PC, QBD, Corp, TD[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Drygore, Kalphite, Chaotic claws, Max/Comp cape[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Crucible weapons, revenants, PvP gear[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Dueling, dicing, Grand Exchange[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Custom titles, Achievements, Override shop[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Loyalty points, Squeal of Fortune, Auras[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Prestige mode/points[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Generous experience rates and drops! Will not take forever to reach endgame![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• No donation needed to access all gear and valuables![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Difficulty levels for easier training or better drops[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]In-Development[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Complete revamp of everything will make it as realistic as RuneScape as possible clean all bugs and glitches[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• New minigames with PvPvM[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Better balancing of economy so all players thrive[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• All items properly priced and stats correct[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• New EoC models, load higher revision cache[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• New layout, optimize function and features of server[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Redo dialogues and make it more player friendly[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Exciting quests with combat and group effort[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Implement Bounty Hunting and expand from there to a dedicated PvPvM server[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Improve all current features like Prestige Mode unlocking level 120 in all stats after Prestiging a certain amount of times[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Modify all drop tables to have more variation and higher range of drops[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Add sounds to all weapons and attacks[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Make custom boss battles long and harder[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Sheathing when out-of-combat[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Remove all player commands and implement in-game dialogues/buttons instead[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Make all skills free to begin training[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Add Prestige Bonuses[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Bounty Hunter/PvP World[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• High-risk PvP[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Player Slaying, Group Slayer[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Soul Wars[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Lootshare/coinshare[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Clans with tags[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Frost dragons[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Ice strykewyrms[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Player-owned shops/Auction house[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=5]Currently In-Progress[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Just begun, come join and be a part of this revolution now![/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Exploring packages to brainstorm priorities, creating todo list[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Setting up website, forums, youtube, webclient, etc[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Minor fixes and changes[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Pro promo video[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman]• Banner graphics design[/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][I]So, what are you waiting for?[/I][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][I]Come check out [COLOR=red]RuneSol[/COLOR] today![/I][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][/FONT]
[/CENTER]
[RIGHT][CENTER][FONT=Times New Roman](Ad updated 2.18.14)[/FONT…
